title: Remove footer disclaimer from GutOptim landing page

requirements.summary: Remove the FDA product disclaimer paragraph from the landing page footer while preserving copyright and caffeine.ai attribution, and ensure spacing remains clean.
acceptanceCriteria: The footer no longer renders the disclaimer paragraph that begins with “Disclaimer: These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration...”.
The footer still renders the existing copyright line and the “Built with … caffeine.ai” attribution link.
No other new disclaimer or replacement text is introduced elsewhere on the page as part of this change.
Footer spacing remains visually clean (no awkward extra gap where the disclaimer was removed).

file_operations.description:
Remove the disclaimer

block from the footer render output while keeping the copyright line and the “Built with … caffeine.ai” attribution link intact; adjust any layout/spacing classes if needed so the footer remains visually balanced with no extra gap introduced.
